title: ImageDownloaderService created to download speaker, sponsor, venue, .. images…
message:
ImageDownloaderService created to download speaker, sponsor, venue, .. images from txlf website for use in the app. Defaults to apk resource files if not downloaded in time or other error. Stores images in android app getCacheDir, cleans up on every guide update to keep data usage low, but also does not redownload existing files. this could make updating image a pain, but change the guide imagestring and it will update..

Updated SessionView to use downloaded image or default to apk resource image.
Updated GuideDownloaderService to accept new images for speakers, venue, sponsors, etc.

txlf.apk updated

title: Created Guide Downloader Service to manage retrieving
message:
Created Guide Downloader Service to manage retrieving
the json txt from the server and saving it as a serialized
object easily read by android.

Also created an alarm and reciever to manage the guide
updates.

Cleaned up the main activity from some of the clutter.

title: Decided instead of json storage to use Object storage
message:
Decided instead of json storage to use Object storage
 Serialize the output to a file, and deserialize when reading in.
Should be easier and faster to load up the application.

See Guide.java

title: Several changes:
message:
Several changes:
  1. Plenty of testing for items
  2. Set up Retrieval from web of event guide (plaintext json)
  3. Writing and Reading Stored event guide on internal storage
  4. Checking event guide expiry, and updating as necessary

There is still a lot of work needing to be done.

New Ideas:
 - Sponsor code for sponsors to utilize features catered to them
 - volunteer code for event day volunteers to keep in sync
 - admin code for event organizers to stay in sync and well communicated during the event day
